729512f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Van Pelt Avenue
729512f-a.text:
2846 and 2856 Richmonc Terrace, adjoining the
S.W. corner of Van Pelt Avenue, showing the homes of
George and John Thompson, both in the oyster business.
September 28, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis tnrough P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729512f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Van Pelt Avenue, Staten Island, NY
